name: 劉玉蓀
objective: 本課程介紹各種數位調變技術, 如 pulse amplitude modulation, (PAM), phase shift keying (PSK), frequency shift keying (FSK), 及quadrture-amplitude modulation (QAM)等, 並比較其優劣.
schedule:
1. Power spectral density, energy spectral density (2 weeks) (Section 2.5)
2. Geometric representation of signal waveforms and optimal receiver (2 weeks) (Sections 8.1, 8.3)
3. Baseband pulse transmission (PAM) and band-limited channel (3 weeks) (Sections 8.2, 8.4, 9.1, 9.2)
4. Passband digital transmission (3 weeks) (Chap. 10)
5. Random processes, AWGN, vector channel (3 weeks) (Section 5.2 & 5.3)
6. Digital transmission revisited (3 weeks) (Sections 8.5, 10.2,10.3)
7. Complex envelope (optional)
scorePolicy:
作業 (佔30%)
二次考試 (各佔35%)
二子三與四子三評分標準不同, 二子三與四子四評分標準相同
